wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Watson (born 4 April 1973 in Liverpool) is an English former professional footballer who played for and captained Scottish side St Mirren in the early 1990s.

response: Steve or Stephen Watson may also refer to:
*Stephen Watson (footballer) (born 1973), footballer for Rangers and St Mirren
*Stephen Watson (racing driver) (born 1974), South African racing driver
